{{Radio station | image =<!-- Deleted image removed: [[Image:Abclocalradio.png]] -->| name = 91.7 ABC Coast FM| callsign = 4ABCRR| airdate = [[1988]] | frequency = 91.7 [[Megahertz|MHz]] [[frequency modulation|FM]]| area = [[Gold Coast, Queensland|Gold Coast]] and [[Tweed Heads, New South Wales|Tweed Coast]]| owner = [[Australian Broadcasting Corporation]] | format = [[Talk radio / music|Talk]] | website = [http://www.abc.net.au/goldcoast/ http://www.abc.net.au/goldcoast/] | coordinates = {{coord|28|2|35.06|S|153|26|5.66|E|display=inline,title}} }}
'''91.7 ABC Coast FM''' is an [[ABC Local Radio]] station. Based in the suburb of [[Mermaid Beach, Queensland|Mermaid Beach]], the station broadcasts to the [[Gold Coast, Queensland|Gold Coast]] and surrounding hinterland in [[Queensland]], covering as far south as [[Byron Bay, New South Wales|Byron Bay]] in [[New South Wales]].
The callsign is 4ABCRR. The station started life in [[1983]] as ''1593AM 4SO Gold Coast Rock''. Originally set-up to target the youth market, the station is now a news, current affairs and [[adult contemporary music]] station.
==Local Programs== Unlike most of the other ABC Local stations outside the capital cities, ABC Coast FM originates most of its own programming and has a higher music content. Breakfast, Mornings and Drive programs are a mix of music, news and current affairs. Afternoons are predominantly music based. Weekends also contain a high music content.
Along with [[90.3 ABC Coast FM]] on the [[Sunshine Coast]] the station does not carry any of the [[ABC Rural]] programs such as ''The Country Hour''. Both stations also uniquely rebroadcast the ABCâs digital only radio station [[ABC DiG|DiG]] at certain times.
===Local Announcers=== * 2:00amâ6:00am Trevor Chappell (Monday to Thursday) or Rod Quinn (Friday), Overnights (broadcast nationally) * 5:00amâ7:45am Tim Cox, Breakfast * 8:00amâ8:30am Tony Eastley, AM (broadcast nationally) * 8:30amâ11:00am Nicole Dyer, Mornings * 11:00amâ12:00pm Richard Fidler, Conversations * 12:00pmâ1:00pm Eleanor Hall, The World Today (broadcast nationally) * 1:00pmâ3:00pm [[Richard Fidler]], Afternoons * 3:00pmâ6:00pm Bernadette Young, Drive * 6:00pmâ7:00pm Mark Colvin, PM (Broadcast nationally) * 7:00pmâ10:00pm [[Steve Austin]], Evenings (broadcast throughout Queenslandl) * 10:00pmâ2:00am Tony Delroy, [[NightLife|Nightlife]] (broadcast nationally)
* Peter Scott, Weekends Trevor Jackson is the ABC Coast FM Content Director for the Gold Coast & Music Director for both the Gold & Sunshine Coast stations.
